steps: Grind the panko breadcrumbs so they are much finer.
In three plates, setup a breading line. First should be flour, second the egg, and finally breadcrumbs.
For each chicken piece, dip in flour, egg, then breadcrumbs and place in a baking sheet. Spray with oil or brush so the pieces are coated.
Bake for 20-25 minutes. While the chicken is baking, make the sauce.
Add the tbsp of oil, ginger, garlic, and red pepper to a saucepan on medium heat and cook for 30 seconods until fragrant.
Add the rest of the sauce ingredients, bring to a boil until it thickens then turn off the heat.
While chicken is still warm, toss with the sauce and serve.
